text:
Primity Bio | San Francisco Bay Area | Frontend or Full-Stack | Onsite or Remote

We're building a real-time, cloud-based bioinformatics data analysis application and seeking engineers to join our team. (No experience in biology needed.)

Ideally you have a passion for and experience with building highly interactive, creative interfaces (e.g. business intelligence or dashboarding apps, products like Google Docs). Our stack includes Vue and node.js.

zbjornson at primitybio . com
